# vem_message_generator

### usage
#### generate VEM
```shell
go run cmd/main.go --validators 0x123,0x234 --pk 3c419398dbdf7b0a2a2a49008dc2f9898f2b84e799b51
```
#### decrypt VEM

```shell
# golang usage
go run cmd/main.go --ecdhPrivateKey be0ff21fb9df7d0471c2b5c19e2f9a3b1a903753f9dc4ffac5fe86acc38d5af0 --encryptedMessage 

# js usage
node js/index.js --ecdhPrivateKey be0ff21fb9df7d0471c2b5c19e2f9a3b1a903753f9dc4ffac5fe86acc38d5af0 --encryptedMessage 
```
